comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: LOC, note the transcription error: negative properly spells name as Cravath. Star outfielders of the Red Sox (Speaker) and the Phillies (Cravath). Speaker was voted into the Baseball Hall of Fame in In 1937, Cravath led the majors in 1915 in home runs, runs batted in and slugging percentage. Probably taken before game one of the 1915 World Series in Philadelphia. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gavvy_Cravath www.retrosheet.org/boxesetc/C/Pcravg101.htm en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tris_Speaker www.baseball-reference.com/leagues/MLB/1915-batting-leade...

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for catching this artolog. We'll make the correction the next time we update.
